verses.verse: וּמִקְנֶ֣ה ׀ <S%H4735><s%> of cattle רַ֗ב <S%H7227><s%> multitude הָיָ֞ה <S%H1961><s%> had לִבְנֵ֧י <S%H1121><s%> Now the children רְאוּבֵ֛ן <S%H7205><s%> of Reuben וְלִבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> and the children גָ֖ד <S%H1410><s%> of Gad עָצ֣וּם <S%H6099><s%> great מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> had a very וַיִּרְא֞וּ <S%H7200><s%> and when they saw אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land יַעְזֵר֙ <S%H3270><s%> of Jazer וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and the land גִּלְעָ֔ד <S%H1568><s%> of Gilead וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> indeed הַמָּק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> that behold the place מְק֥וֹם <S%H4725><s%> [was] a place מִקְנֶֽה׃ <S%H4735><s%> for cattle

וַיָּבֹ֥אוּ <S%H935><s%> came בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> The children גָ֖ד <S%H1410><s%> of Gad וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> and the children רְאוּבֵ֑ן <S%H7205><s%> of Reuben וַיֹּאמְר֤וּ <S%H559><s%> and spake אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to אֶלְעָזָ֣ר <S%H499><s%> and to Eleazar הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to נְשִׂיאֵ֥י <S%H5387><s%> and unto the princes הָעֵדָ֖ה <S%H5712><s%> of the congregation לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

עֲטָר֤וֹת <S%H5852><s%> Ataroth וְדִיבֹן֙ <S%H1769><s%> and Dibon וְיַעְזֵ֣ר <S%H3270><s%> and Jazer וְנִמְרָ֔ה <S%H5247><s%> and Nimrah וְחֶשְׁבּ֖וֹן <S%H2809><s%> and Heshbon וְאֶלְעָלֵ֑ה <S%H500><s%> and Elealeh וּשְׂבָ֥ם <S%H7643><s%> and Shebam וּנְב֖וֹ <S%H5015><s%> and Nebo וּבְעֹֽן׃ <S%H1194><s%> and Beon

הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> [Even] the country אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which הִכָּ֤ה <S%H5221><s%> smote יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD לִפְנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> before עֲדַ֣ת <S%H5712><s%> the congregation יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> [is] a land מִקְנֶ֖ה <S%H4735><s%> for cattle הִ֑וא <S%H1931><s%> he וְלַֽעֲבָדֶ֖יךָ <S%H5650><s%> and thy servants מִקְנֶֽה׃ <S%H4735><s%> have cattle ס

וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> Wherefore said אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If מָצָ֤אנוּ <S%H4672><s%> they if we have found חֵן֙ <S%H2580><s%> grace בְּעֵינֶ֔יךָ <S%H5869><s%> in thy sight יֻתַּ֞ן <S%H5414><s%> be given אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֧רֶץ <S%H776><s%> let this land הַזֹּ֛את <S%H2063><s%> likewise לַעֲבָדֶ֖יךָ <S%H5650><s%> unto thy servants לַאֲחֻזָּ֑ה <S%H272><s%> for a possession אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּעֲבִרֵ֖נוּ <S%H5674><s%> [and] bring us not over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <S%H3383><s%> Jordan

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses לִבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> unto the children גָ֖ד <S%H1410><s%> of Gad וְלִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> and to the children רְאוּבֵ֑ן <S%H7205><s%> of Reuben הַאַֽחֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H251><s%> Shall your brethren יָבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> go לַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> to war וְאַתֶּ֖ם <S%H859><s%> you תֵּ֥שְׁבוּ <S%H3427><s%> and shall ye sit פֹֽה׃ <S%H6311><s%> here

וְלָ֣מָּה <S%H4100><s%> now why [תְנוּאוּן כ] (תְנִיא֔וּן <S%H5106><s%> break ק) אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לֵ֖ב <S%H3820><s%> the heart בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מֵֽעֲבֹר֙ <S%H5674><s%> from going over אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> into the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> hath given לָהֶ֖ם יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD

כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> This עָשׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> Thus did אֲבֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H1><s%> your fathers בְּשָׁלְחִ֥י <S%H7971><s%> when I sent אֹתָ֛ם <S%H853><s%> מִקָּדֵ֥שׁ בַּרְנֵ֖עַ <S%H6947><s%> them from Kadeshbarnea לִרְא֥וֹת <S%H7200><s%> to see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> the land

וַֽיַּעֲל֞וּ <S%H5927><s%> For when they went up עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> up נַ֣חַל <S%H5158><s%> unto the valley אֶשְׁכּ֗וֹל <S%H812><s%> of Eshcol וַיִּרְאוּ֙ <S%H7200><s%> and saw אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land וַיָּנִ֕יאוּ <S%H5106><s%> they discouraged אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לֵ֖ב <S%H3820><s%> the heart בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לְבִלְתִּי־ <S%H1115><s%> did not בֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> that they should not go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> into the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> had given לָהֶ֖ם יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD

וַיִּֽחַר־ <S%H2734><s%> was kindled אַ֥ף <S%H639><s%> anger יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD'S בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> the same time הַה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> and He וַיִּשָּׁבַ֖ע <S%H7650><s%> and he sware לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Surely יִרְא֨וּ <S%H7200><s%> shall see הָאֲנָשִׁ֜ים <S%H376><s%> of the men הָעֹלִ֣ים <S%H5927><s%> that came up מִמִּצְרַ֗יִם <S%H4714><s%> out of Egypt מִבֶּ֨ן <S%H1121><s%> old עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <S%H6242><s%> from twenty שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> years וָמַ֔עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> and upward אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> הָאֲדָמָ֔ה <S%H127><s%> the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which נִשְׁבַּ֛עְתִּי <S%H7650><s%> which I sware לְאַבְרָהָ֥ם <S%H85><s%> unto Abraham לְיִצְחָ֖ק <S%H3327><s%> unto Isaac וּֽלְיַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> and unto Jacob כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not מִלְא֖וּ <S%H4390><s%> because they have not wholly אַחֲרָֽי׃ <S%H310><s%> followed

בִּלְתִּ֞י <S%H1115><s%> except כָּלֵ֤ב <S%H3612><s%> Save Caleb בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְפֻנֶּה֙ <S%H3312><s%> of Jephunneh הַקְּנִזִּ֔י <S%H7074><s%> the Kenezite וִיהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <S%H3091><s%> and Joshua בִּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נ֑וּן <S%H5126><s%> of Nun כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for מִלְא֖וּ <S%H4390><s%> for they have wholly אַחֲרֵ֥י <S%H310><s%> followed יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

וַיִּֽחַר־ <S%H2734><s%> was kindled אַ֤ף <S%H639><s%> anger יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD'S בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> against Israel וַיְנִעֵם֙ <S%H5128><s%> and he made them wander בַּמִּדְבָּ֔ר <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness אַרְבָּעִ֖ים <S%H705><s%> forty שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until תֹּם֙ <S%H8552><s%> was consumed כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> the entire הַדּ֔וֹר <S%H1755><s%> until all the generation הָעֹשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> that had done הָרַ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> evil בְּעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> now behold קַמְתֶּ֗ם <S%H6965><s%> And behold ye are risen up תַּ֚חַת <S%H8478><s%> place אֲבֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H1><s%> in your fathers' תַּרְבּ֖וּת <S%H8635><s%> stead an increase אֲנָשִׁ֣ים <S%H582><s%> men חַטָּאִ֑ים <S%H2400><s%> of sinful לִסְפּ֣וֹת <S%H5595><s%> to augment ע֗וֹד <S%H5750><s%> still עַ֛ל <S%H5921><s%> unto חֲר֥וֹן <S%H2740><s%> yet the fierce אַף־ <S%H639><s%> anger יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> toward Israel

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for תְשׁוּבֻן֙ <S%H7725><s%> For if ye turn away מֵֽאַחֲרָ֔יו <S%H310><s%> from after וְיָסַ֣ף <S%H3254><s%> him he will yet again ע֔וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again לְהַנִּיח֖וֹ <S%H3240><s%> leave בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> them in the wilderness וְשִֽׁחַתֶּ֖ם <S%H7843><s%> and ye shall destroy לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> all this people הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> these ס

וַיִּגְּשׁ֤וּ <S%H5066><s%> And they came near אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> to him וַ֣יֹּאמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> unto him and said גִּדְרֹ֥ת <S%H1448><s%> wall צֹ֛אן <S%H6629><s%> cattle נִבְנֶ֥ה <S%H1129><s%> We will build לְמִקְנֵ֖נוּ <S%H4735><s%> here for our cattle פֹּ֑ה <S%H6311><s%> here וְעָרִ֖ים <S%H5892><s%> and cities לְטַפֵּֽנוּ׃ <S%H2945><s%> for our little ones

וַאֲנַ֜חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> But we ourselves נֵחָלֵ֣ץ <S%H2502><s%> armed חֻשִׁ֗ים <S%H2363><s%> will go ready לִפְנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> before בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel עַ֛ד <S%H5704><s%> against אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo הֲבִֽיאֹנֻ֖ם <S%H935><s%> until we have brought אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מְקוֹמָ֑ם <S%H4725><s%> them unto their place וְיָשַׁ֤ב <S%H3427><s%> shall dwell טַפֵּ֙נוּ֙ <S%H2945><s%> and our little ones בְּעָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> cities הַמִּבְצָ֔ר <S%H4013><s%> in the fenced מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> because יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <S%H3427><s%> of the inhabitants הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the land

לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> We will not נָשׁ֖וּב <S%H7725><s%> We will not return אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בָּתֵּ֑ינוּ <S%H1004><s%> unto our houses עַ֗ד <S%H5704><s%> until הִתְנַחֵל֙ <S%H5157><s%> have inherited בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> until the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man נַחֲלָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H5159><s%> his inheritance

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> because לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> we will not נִנְחַל֙ <S%H5157><s%> For we will not inherit אִתָּ֔ם <S%H854><s%> on מֵעֵ֥בֶר <S%H5676><s%> with them on yonder side לַיַּרְדֵּ֖ן <S%H3383><s%> Jordan וָהָ֑לְאָה <S%H1973><s%> or forward כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> because בָ֤אָה <S%H935><s%> is fallen נַחֲלָתֵ֙נוּ֙ <S%H5159><s%> because our inheritance אֵלֵ֔ינוּ <S%H413><s%> about מֵעֵ֥בֶר <S%H5676><s%> to us on this side הַיַּרְדֵּ֖ן <S%H3383><s%> Jordan מִזְרָֽחָה׃ <S%H4217><s%> eastward פ

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֲלֵיהֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> about מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אִֽם־ <S%H518><s%> If תַּעֲשׂ֖וּן <S%H6213><s%> unto them If ye will do אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> this thing הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if תֵּחָ֥לְצ֛וּ <S%H2502><s%> if ye will go armed לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> to war

וְעָבַ֨ר <S%H5674><s%> over לָכֶ֧ם כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all חָל֛וּץ <S%H2502><s%> all of you armed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיַּרְדֵּ֖ן <S%H3383><s%> Jordan לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD עַ֧ד <S%H5704><s%> until הוֹרִישׁ֛וֹ <S%H3423><s%> until he hath driven out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֹיְבָ֖יו <S%H341><s%> his enemies מִפָּנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> from before

וְנִכְבְּשָׁ֨ה <S%H3533><s%> be subdued הָאָ֜רֶץ <S%H776><s%> And the land לִפְנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְאַחַ֣ר <S%H310><s%> then afterward תָּשֻׁ֔בוּ <S%H7725><s%> ye shall return וִהְיִיתֶ֧ם <S%H1961><s%> become נְקִיִּ֛ים <S%H5355><s%> and be guiltless מֵיְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> before the LORD וּמִיִּשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> and before Israel וְ֠הָיְתָה <S%H1961><s%> become הָאָ֨רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and this land הַזֹּ֥את <S%H2063><s%> likewise לָכֶ֛ם לַאֲחֻזָּ֖ה <S%H272><s%> shall be your possession לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD
